start.text: , You find yourself in a dark forest. What do you do?

options.text: Go left
Go right

leftPath.text: You follow the left path and discover a mysterious pond surrounded by fireflies. What's your next move?

options.text: Take a sip from the pond
Continue exploring the left path

sipPondWater.text: The pond water has magical properties! You feel rejuvenated and gain a mysterious power.

options.text: Head back to the main path
Explore the area around the pond

explorePondArea.text: You find a hidden cave behind the pond. Inside, you discover ancient runes and a magical artifact.

options.text: Take the magical artifact
Leave the cave and head back to the main path

takeArtifact.text: As you take the artifact, the cave begins to tremble. You narrowly escape as the entrance collapses behind you.

options.text: Continue on the main path

continueLeftPath.text: The left path leads you to a clearing where you find a group of friendly forest creatures having a celebration.

options.text: Join the celebration
Politely decline and continue your journey

joinCelebration.text: You join the celebration and make new friends. They offer guidance for your quest and share valuable resources.

options.text: Express gratitude and continue your journey

rightPath.text: You discover a hidden treasure. What's your next move?

options.text: Open the treasure chest
Leave it and continue exploring

openTreasure.text: As you open the treasure chest, a burst of light reveals ancient artifacts and a map to the heart of the enchanted forest.

options.text: Follow the map to the heart of the enchanted forest
Close the chest and continue exploring

heartOfForest.text: You reach the heart of the enchanted forest, where ancient magic emanates. A wise spirit appears, offering guidance for your quest.

options.text: Listen to the spirit's guidance
Explore the heart of the forest on your own

listenToSpirit.text: The spirit shares ancient wisdom and reveals a hidden portal leading to a mystical realm. Your adventure continues in the unknown.

options.text: Enter the portal and embrace the unknown
Choose a different path and continue exploring the enchanted forest

unknownRealm.text: As you enter the portal, the world transforms around you. You find yourself in a realm of magic and mysteries, ready for new adventures.

options.text: Embark on new quests in the unknown realm

continueExploring.text: You decide to leave the treasure behind and continue exploring the enchanted forest.

options.text: Explore the left path
Explore the right path

exploreOnYourOwn.text: As you have explored you got tired.

options.text: Continue on the main path
